hero.title: Business Taxi
hero.subtitle: Premium and representative transport for corporate travelers
hero.description: A business taxi is a premium transport type designed for passengers who expect maximum reliability, comfort, and professionalism. It is ideal for executive travel, business meetings, airport transfers, and corporate hospitality.
hero.ctaSecondary: See what makes Business Class unique
hero.imageAlt: Business class taxi with professional chauffeur

howItWorks.title: How does a business ride work?

steps.title: 1. Schedule your ride
steps.text: Enter your pick-up location, destination, and preferences.

steps.title: 2. Chauffeur assigned
steps.text: A professional chauffeur is automatically assigned to your ride.

steps.title: 3. Travel in business class
steps.text: Enjoy comfort, discretion, and a seamless travel experience.

ratesSection.title: Rates
ratesSection.description: Business Class pricing is transparent and based on distance, route, and vehicle category.
ratesSection.note: Corporate invoicing is available for registered business clients.

bookingCard.title: Ready to schedule a business ride?
bookingCard.description: Book instantly within one minute — your confirmation is sent immediately.

items.title: Professional chauffeurs
items.text: Selected for discretion, driving style, and representation.

items.title: Luxury comfort
items.text: Premium vehicles for a calm and efficient journey.

items.title: Flexibility
items.text: Waiting time, extra stops, and invoicing options available.

nationwide.title: National & International
nationwide.text: Business Class rides are available throughout the Netherlands and major corporate hubs such as Brussels, Düsseldorf, Antwerp, and Frankfurt.

items.question: Is Business Class suitable for executives?
items.answer: Yes, it is specifically designed for CEOs, directors, and business delegations.

items.question: Can I pay by invoice?
items.answer: Yes, registered companies can receive monthly invoices.

items.question: Are the vehicles fully equipped?
items.answer: Yes, with water, WiFi, privacy options, and a premium interior.

seo.title: Business Class Taxi – Professional Corporate Transportation
seo.description: Premium business-class taxi services with luxury vehicles, professional chauffeurs, and maximum reliability for corporate travelers.
